casebody.data:
Stephen E. HOPKINS, Personal Representative of the Estate of William P. Hopkins, II, Appellant,
v.
NEW TAMPA ASSISTED LIVING COMMUNITY, LLC; Angels Senior Living at New Tampa, LLC ; Angels Care Health Systems, Inc., a/k/a Angels Care Health Systems, LLC (as to Connerton Court of New Tampa n/k/a Angels Senior Living at New Tampa, LLC ), Appellees. DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
